# fly_volume (Data Source)

Fly volume resource



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `app` (String) Name of app attached to
- `id` (String) ID of volume

### Read-Only

- `name` (String) name
- `region` (String) region
- `size` (Number) Size of volume in GB
